title: Read 30 mins Daily
detailedDescription: Immerse yourself in books, articles, or news for at least 30 minutes every day.

title: Exercise 3 Times a Week
shortDescription: Boost your energy and physical health.
detailedDescription: Engage in at least 30 minutes of moderate to intense physical activity three times a week.

title: Meditate 10 mins Daily
detailedDescription: Practice mindfulness meditation for 10 minutes each day.

title: Drink 8 Glasses of Water
detailedDescription: Ensure you drink at least 8 glasses of water throughout the day.

title: Journal Daily
detailedDescription: Dedicate 15 minutes each day to journaling. Helps in self-reflection and goal setting.

title: Learn a New Skill Weekly
detailedDescription: Spend a few hours each week learning something new.
